Question
========

Given is the following table of observed frequencies:

![](vufgb-frequencytable-001-en-frequencytable01.jpg)
  
What percentage of the observations should fall in the "Female-Yes" cell under the null hypothesis that gender has no connection with belief in an afterlife?

Answerlist
----------
* 75%
* 25%
* 40%
* 60%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
